name: TeamLeaderboard
functionalRequirements:
## Team Leaderboard

### Purpose
Display top performing sales representatives with key metrics.

### Features
- Ranked list of sales reps
- Key metrics: deals closed, revenue, win rate
- Visual ranking indicators
- Click to view rep details
- Top 3 highlighting

entities.name: Deals
entities.usageContext: Aggregated by owner for performance calculations

technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- repData: Array of rep performance objects
- onRepClick: Callback for rep selection

### Display
- Ranked table with medals for top 3
- Formatted metrics
- Hover effects

properties.name: repData
properties.type: Array<{id: string, name: string, dealsClosed: number, revenue: number, winRate: number}>
